TopicTitle: it would be cool to have KSP on VR

Articles.Content: I think it would be cool to have a ksp for htc vive. You could build a model out of parts to build rockets (with the parts comeing out of boxes of parts) , and IVA and external camaras while flying.
Something like this would be great but awhile before anything official would be developed.

That is a pretty cool idea, but i think its more of a mod idea for something like a modpack. Because VR in stock KSP sounds pretty cool, but the graphics just dont fit in with VR. But combine it with Scatterer and EVE and you are going to have the time of your life i swear to the kraken.

I dunno, a lot of cartoony games work great in VR, and I'm not sure KSP would handle high-quality graphics and being basically run on two screens at once (maybe three) and the tracking of the headset and hand controllers very well. It'd be a cool mod though if someone could get it to work!

3 hours ago, zebidia kerman said:

I thought it would look good with a more cartoony style.

Less detail is always easier to do in VR, especially when it has to go hand in hand with complex physics calculations. But if I could get RVE running smoothly in a headset, I would totally go for it.

A few guys already did VR for KSP on a Google Cardboard-like device with some Android apps, including TrinusVR which allows you to send your screen to your phone so you can view it with VR headgear. The results are pretty cool especially if you fly IVA.

Not sure if the head tracking works decent enough though. That may still need some work which could warrant a special VR mod.
I would get dizzy doing barrel rolls in a plane while on VR .
